statements: UPDATE game_progress SET save_state = '0x123456', last_saved_at = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_progress SET last_saved_at = '2022-01-18 08:45:00', save_state = '0xFFAA99' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_progress SET progress_data = '{"level": 5, "coins": 100}' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE save_states SET saved_data = '{"checkpoint": "Level 3", "health": 80}' WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE save_states SET saved_data = '{
"player_name": "Alice", "game_level": 5}' WHERE player_id = 123 AND save_id = 'e2a6f119-c160-4cdd-9883-476c2e443f0b';
UPDATE game_progress SET progress_data = '{
"completed_levels": [1, 2, 4], "total_points": 250}' WHERE game_id = 789 AND player_id = 456;
UPDATE player SET level = 10, progress = 0.75 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE save_state SET state = '{"progress": 0.8}' WHERE save_id = 2;
UPDATE player SET level = 10, progress = 0.75 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE save_state SET state = '{"progress": 0.85}' WHERE game_id = 456 AND player_id = 789;
UPDATE player SET game_progress = 50 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 100, rank = 1 WHERE leaderboard_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player SET game_progress = 50, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 1000, rank = 1 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND game_id = '987e6543-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player SET level = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game SET platform = 'Xbox' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE player SET coins = coins + 100 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE player_id = 456 AND item_name = 'sword';
